isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - CAB DOOR AND HINGE

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Cab Door Hinge
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If cab door hinge (Item 7) was removed from cab hinge pillar (Item 8), position cab door hinge on cab hinge pillar. Align cab door hinge with scribe marks on cab hinge pillar and secure it with six hex flanged head bolts (Item 9) (top three hex flanged head bolts shown). Install three hex flanged head bolts at bottom of hinge (not shown). Tighten to 180 Lbf-in (20 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Cab Door

step1.para: Use a sling or padded chain through top of window opening and attach sling to an overhead hoist to support door.

note.para: If the door has electrically controlled windows, heated mirrors, courtesy light or CB antenna, reconnect wiring.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door (Item 3) in place at cab door hinge (Item 4) and feed cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 5) through hole in cab door hinge.

Position cab door (Item 3) in place against cab door hinge (Item 4) on cab hinge pillar (Item 8) and install six hex flanged head bolts (Item 6) (top three hex flanged head bolts shown). Install three hex flanged head bolts at bottom of hinge (not shown), securing it to cab door hinge. Tighten cab door hinge bolts to 180 Lbf-in (20 N•m).

Once cab door (Item 3) is secured to cab door hinge (Item 4) place plastic washer over cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 5). Connect cab door courtesy light switch (Item 1) to cab door courtesy light switch connector and thread cab door courtesy light switch into cab door hinge and cab door by turning cab door courtesy light switch hex nut (Item 2) until tight.

If adjustment is required to align cab door to cab door opening for proper fit after reinstalling cab door, refer to ADJUSTMENTS,
CAB DOOR HINGE
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door check strap (Item 2) on cab door frame (Item 3) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 1).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Carefully feed each connector of cab door electrical cable (Item 1) through cab hinge pillar (Item 3) and cab hinge pillar grommet (Item 4) into cab side panel (Item 2); each connector will have to be fed through separately.
Reach into side of cab and carefully pull electrical cable and connectors (Item 1) through side of cab (Item 2) as far as it will go.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Reach under dash panel and connect courtesy light connector (Item 1) and CB cable connector (Item 2). If so equipped, connect electric window connector (Item 3) and electric door lock connector (Item 4). If vehicle is equipped with heated mirrors and/or electric mirrors, connect connectors for them also.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab side insulator panel (Item 6) on driver side in place and install one black plastic trim fastener (Item 7) in top flange, then install two self tapping pan head screws and washers (Item 8).
Position dimmer switch (Item 5) in place and install two pan head screws (Item 4) to secure it.

Position cab front insulator panel (Item 1) under instrument panel and install two black plastic trim fasteners (Item 2) in top flange, then install one self tapping pan head screw and washer (Item 3).
